com.cloudera.labs.envelope.hbase

Interface HBaseSerde

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHBaseSerde

    public interface HBaseSerde
    Interface defining methods to convert to/from HBase cells from/to Spark Rows.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  HBaseSerde.ColumnDef
      Simple Column specification for HBase columns
      static class  HBaseSerde.RowToDelete
      Function to convert from Row to Delete
      static class  HBaseSerde.RowToPut
      Function to convert from Row to Put
      static class  HBaseSerde.RowToQuery
      Function to convert from Row to Query

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Config config)
      Configure the Serde.
      Row convertFromResult(Result result)
      Convert the given HBase Result to a Row
      List<Row> convertFromResults(Iterable<Result> results)
      Convert an iterable of Result objects to a list of Rows
      Delete convertToDelete(Row row)
      Convert the given Row to a Delete All columns in the Row are mapped to Deletes but the only _values_ of row columns considered are those of row key columns
      List<Delete> convertToDeletes(List<Row> rows)
      Convert a list of Rows to HBase Deletes
      Put convertToPut(Row row)
      Convert the given Row to a Put
      List<Put> convertToPuts(List<Row> rows)
      Convert a list of Rows to a list of Puts
      Query convertToQuery(Row row)
      Convert the given Row to a Query
